msg: We do not want to return EAGAIN if there is a timeout set on the socket.

a bit more space for the name of the failed module as it can be a full path.

str* and mem* functions. This fixes all of them. APR_HAVE_STRINGS_H is now

author: rbb
msg: We need to search for AP_DECLARE APR_DECLARE and APU_DECLARE now.

author: wrowe
msg: The prior patch broke httpd.  libapr.dsp relies on apr.dsp exporting all
symbols, even if they are not used for anything more than a single binary
(e.g. apache support apps).  The answer is to duplicate and maintain the
entire list of sources in both projects.  Until we have a sane way to do
this, the prior patch is reverted.
